lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and it is very satisfying to see the impact just a small amount of money can make to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: empowering others to bring God's light to the world.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want my donations to go directly to people who want to make a difference to their lives
lender.occupational_info: I write about how life used to be in Britain particularly for women and plot the important changes in what we wear and our surroundings

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: people need

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: It helps other people through rough times

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Emmanuel Episcopal Church
lender.loan_because: We are a loving parish of caring Christians concerned about each other, our neighbors and the world.
lender.occupational_info:
SHARING THE JOY AND POWER OF LIFE IN CHRIST!
Emmanuel is a spirit-filled community that values the diversity which reflects the richness of our local community. We are in Virginia Beach, VA in the Diocese of Southern Virginia. We are a loving parish of caring Christians concerned about each other, our neighbors and the world. Our worship is meaningful, our music is joyful. Our Episcopal heritage is rich with tradition. Our services are a blend of traditional and contemporary styles. We love the Book of Common Prayer, especially Rite II. Our music is eclectic with a variety of hymns, gospel songs and praise music. We value Christian Formation and have strong programs for children, youth and adults. We are committed to outreach in our community and the world. We are a safe haven where God's healing can take place. We are devoted to young people, both in church activities and in support of our Day School. We welcome you to Emmanuel Episcopal Church. Please join us.
All are welcome at our table!

lender.name: EvaMaria
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher at the university

lender.name: Jesus Checa
lender.loan_because: This person-to-person lending approach fall along perfectly well with my way of looking at life, encouraging and supporting the entrepreneurial spirit around

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Philip&Deborah
lender.loan_because: we want to help people establish their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in schools, in country Victoria, Australia.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: poverty law - represent poor people in the community

lender.name: Plugusin
lender.loan_because: We want to help people in developing nations to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher of 12 year old boys and girls.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I can. And Kiva makes it easy. I think we all have a responsibility to one another to help where we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who need help improving their communication skills.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help to improve the life of another person

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I would not be successful if someone did not help me when I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn the skills they need to know to work at their jobs.

lender.name: Jen and Travis
lender.occupation: Radiation Therapist and Dental Lab Technician

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I know we are comforted so we may comfort others
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies make money and get noticed by using the Internet

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to support others with my extra income rather than buy things I don't need.
lender.occupational_info: Solve Problems; Keep things professional, fun, and classy

lender.name: shea
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Roopa
lender.loan_because: There is a tangible good delivered to the entrepreneur and the world - and because I would like my children to learn the lessons these strong women and men have to teach us through this small window into their lives
lender.occupational_info: Lead Talent efforts in a healthcare company

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do to help. I believe that the concept of Kiva is brilliant and it enables those that are more fortunate to help those who need help without barriers or borders. It's also fun - so what could be better!
lender.occupational_info: Improving the quality of life for everyone .

lender.name: Xinyu Wen
lender.loan_because: I hope I can share other's happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working as an assistant professor in Peking University, Beijing, with a focus on atmospheric sciences.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to get a start in business when you have no collateral.. Without a small infusion of capital, the task seems impossible. Also, I want to let the people I make loans to know that someone cares about them. I care.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly do accounting work in the not- for- profit world.

lender.name: Annika
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: incessant, vibrant, powerful, meaningful.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I am proud to be able to help someone that works so hard.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Helping others and accepting help from others makes me smile.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed, and I want to share my blessings with others!

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: When one of us benefits, all of us benefit.
lender.occupational_info: During the day, I work for a company that manufactures lighting products for theatres, churches, television studios, etc. I also write for newspapers and other local publications, and make music with two bands.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I own an entrepreneur and I want to support other business owners. I believe it is truly what I was meant to do. The surest way to resolve any depressed economy is to foster entrepreneurism - whether that economy is the US economy or in a distant part of the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I sell and produce printing and marketing material like postcards, newsletter, and brochures.
I also create CRM driven marketing systems through my division http:\\www.engagementsystems.com.

lender.name: Filipe
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Sharing with the world community is an important part of existing with the world in community.
lender.occupational_info: I am an exercise physiologist with research interests in the physiology of high performance rock climbing and cross-country ski racing. My family has an applied interest in old-time music of the Appalachian region of the USA. We are members of the Christian family of Grace United Methodist Church.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: gift from my granddaughter
lender.occupational_info: Widowed mother of 4, grandmother of 6.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by some friends and think this is an incredible idea. People helping people!!! What else makes the world go around!!
lender.occupational_info: I drive people around.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I care to make a difference in other people's lives!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and volunteer to help others. I also write about "going green" and caring for planet earth, our environment and ourselves

lender.name: Ulli & Dale
lender.loan_because: we have learned that even a little can make a big difference...

lender.name: Maria Y Jose
lender.loan_because: We give back in memory of our parents

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I was once loaned money to help establish my small business. I am forever grateful to the person who showed me this generosity of spirit and hope I can honour them by now lending in-turn.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build custom furniture from local Canadian woods and mixed media. I have a small store with attached workshops and work alongside 2 skilled employees.

lender.name: Mathieu
lender.loan_because: It's an awesome way to help people break the cycle of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I help students at college understand all the benefits afforded to them while they're at school.

lender.name: T.M. Luker
lender.loan_because: I have faced financial hardships in the past and would not be where I am today if I had not received the monetary and emotional support of others to move forward.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I sell our honey at local Farmers' Markets and value the relationship between us and our community members.

lender.name: mandy Nina Louise
lender.loan_because: Its fun, and it gives me a good feeling!
lender.occupational_info: School. I learn stuff.

lender.name: Griffin
lender.loan_because: I know that there are people in the world worse off than I am, and I want to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freshman in high school (9th grade) and I am interested in music and drama.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to achieve through hard work when given the right tools.

lender.name: Georgette
lender.loan_because: We all need each other.
lender.occupational_info: I raise Japanese Maple trees and help stray kitty cats.

lender.name: Adam Harris
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to others in Christ's name.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: to honor those who have helped me--and so that others can be helped and someday help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help the company I work for sell the products it makes through marketing and communications.

lender.name: allie
lender.loan_because: I'm nice.

lender.name: cam
lender.loan_because: I do what I want

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it's a form of giving that counts - it's personal, global and sustainable and I want to be part of a world full of caring people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university that teaches about natural health care. I schedule training for physicians, nurses, acupuncturists and others after they graduate so they can continue to learn how to help their patients.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: To "pay it forward"

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to have people in my past take a chance on me. I'm grateful for what I have and would like to be able to take that same chance to have someone else reach their potential.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can think of no better way to empower people and beat poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I create healthy affordable meals for people, and develop information products online.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It is nice to lend stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I clean my room and get allowance.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to help out people in developing countries, and really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
I graduated from college in May 2009 with a bachelor's in Spanish and currently work full-time at a health insurance company helping seniors apply for state assistance and also have recently started graduate school to get my master's in Spanish. I hope to utilize my Spanish skills in translation and/or helping immigrants and people in developing countries in Latin America.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: there are so many amazing people in the world who deserve the support that I have been so fortunate to have.

lender.name: Maya
lender.occupational_info: Touching humanity one person at a time.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupation: English Language Teaching Assistant in France
lender.loan_because:
"There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always attained by giving them to someone else." - Peyton Conway March
"Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow." - Thornton Wilder

lender.name: charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to support, encourage, and assist others so they may succeed in their businesses. Jesus Christ has blessed me throughout my life in many ways and I would like to share his blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a station engineer at a natural gas storage facility.I control and monitor gas flow and gas pressures for thousands of homes and businesses in and surounding the Pittsburgh (Pennsylvania-U.S.A.)area.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Roel & Annelies
lender.loan_because: we feel that everybody should have a working chance to better their lives
lender.occupational_info: Roel was a buschauffeur driver, Annelies was a employee in a council housing estate, and now we are retired

lender.name: Russell and Beth
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good to help others grow their livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: Desks, chairs, computer monitors, and pure chaos.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to help, and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family, and sometimes other people too.

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: it's a way that a person of modest means can reach out to another person somewhere in the world to say that I admire their spirit and hard work

lender.name: lawrence
lender.loan_because: Because it is a great way to empower people with very little. The great majority!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Travel playing music with my wife and collaborating with musicians all over the world!

lender.name: Kathie
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to people to buy homes.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I believe that SMALL scale capitalism can be helpful in promoting peace and justice.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It seems like an easy way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study chemistry and Spanish at Furman University.

lender.name: Marilyn & David
lender.loan_because: Kiva has given us a way to encourage and support people, around the World, who are working to improve the lives of themselves and their families. In however small a way, we believe this must help to make our shared World a better place.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am a mom and an entrepreneur and would like to invest in other mom entrepreneurs globally.
lender.occupational_info: I am Chief Mom Officer for Wishpot.com, an online social shopping site as well as Chief Mom Advisor for MomForce.com, a website that helps moms find high level virtual jobs.

lender.name: Lynn, Ken and Noa
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Best Friends
lender.loan_because: I want to celebrate the riches that my friends have brought to me. With help and support, anything is possible.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like to.
lender.occupational_info: I develop new treatments for mental disorders like depression.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: it fits in with my love of collaboration and my appreciation of human creativity and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with groups to help them find collaborative, creative solutions to difficult, seemingly impossible problems.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: in the past, friends have made loans to me that allowed me to get out of debt and buy a house. I like being able to help others as my friends have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage people to be kind to animals and to take action to stop the abuse of animals.

lender.name: Carly
lender.occupational_info: I help moms who are ready to be honest about their challenges with motherhood. I inspire them to move forward and become the best moms they can be.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: With all the opportunites I have in my life, I think that I should provide some to other people.

lender.name: Steve & Lynn
lender.loan_because: We can & it makes sense to help those less fortunate. We've owned our own business before, so we want to help others succeed with theirs & lift people out of the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Brittany and Kyle
lender.loan_because: We are starting our life and want to help people who are in the process of building theirs!

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is important to help the poor provide for themselves and their families. This is much better than sending food aid which only helps for a while.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate installation of utilities (electricity, gas, telecommunication) to new and renovated facilities.

lender.name: Kyla
lender.loan_because: when I was introduced to KIVA through a gift certificate from my cousins, I loved the idea of the program.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that every person can make a difference. And microloans is a perfect way to get started!
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I'm unemployed. By swedish standards I might be viewed as not very well off. But compared to millions of other ppl in the world - I have it very well. And I want to help out the way I can.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I have myself, here in one of the richest countries of the world a very hard time to finance our business. I can only imagine how much harder it must be in a poor country. I am glad to lend from the little that I have. It's time that we the people of this world stick together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 46 year old human. Born and raised in Germany. I founded Green Cab San Francisco in 2007. We are now 85 taxi driver who collectively, own and operate 18 Toyota Prius Taxis. In 2010 I started jet an other new business. Check out the following website:

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: feels good
lender.occupational_info: i paint scenes on tiles, then fire them in a kiln. they are used in kitchens, bathrooms.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: There is nothing better than giving and "paying it forward"

lender.name: Ronald and Mari
lender.loan_because: I care to help out
lender.occupational_info: Mari teacher of the 6th grade at a low income school. Ron a swimming pool service tech. work on pool.

lender.name: Jeff and Paula
lender.loan_because: We love to interact with people all around the world, and hear their stories!
lender.occupational_info: Jeff works at a Medical University in Utah where he is part of the ethics board as well as teaches medical students. Paula works at an Elementary School where she teaches reading to children.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: I hope to support people in other countries to have the opportunity to strengthen their families and communities through becoming economically independent.
lender.occupational_info: A passionate advocate for social justice.
